message:
I am using blogger ... I want to add a page to my site just after the domain name ...
I tried to add a new page .. it comes after /p/
for Example : http://www.microsmsm.com/p/resume.html
any way to make it just after the domain name ? ie: microsmsm.com/resume.html
story: Osama Soliman shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Resume
caption: microsmsm.com
description: 19 yo a Curious Student , Like (ordered) : Tech ,Physics and Molecular Biology , Love new Nice Unusual Ideas BTW I hv tons of Ideas which can change the world ! , Hate Schools :D ! I'd like to live in more healthy and productive environment
